text:
[CRM‑201] Lead scoring algorithm prototype

Description: Begin tuning model for sales-qualified vs. non-qualified leads.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Train on past 12 months of conversion data
	•	☑ Export leads above 70% likelihood to SDR dashboard
	•	TBD…
Notes: @dev @data needed for historical conversion dump

[CRM‑202] Email cadence scheduler (MVP)

Description: Allow users to create multi-step email drip sequences.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Create/send/edit cadences via UI
	•	☐ Show basic email stats (opens, clicks) per step
	•	TBD…
Notes: @designer to finalize template UI

[CRM‑203] Auto-log email engagement

Description: Automatically capture opens and link clicks in timeline.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Add event stream for opens
	•	☑ Include timestamped click-through tracking
	•	TBD…

[CRM‑204] Contact enrichment via AI signals

Description: Detect job changes, company size shifts from public data.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Match updates against LinkedIn profiles
	•	Flag major firmographic shifts ☑
	•	TBD…

[CRM‑205] Dashboard metrics: email activity

Description: Prototype bar chart of daily open/click rates.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Show last 14 days’ activity
	•	☐ Toggle per cadence
	•	TBD…
Notes: Basic metrics only, not funnel deep dive yet

[CRM‑206] Scoring rules editor

Description: UI to adjust AI scoring thresholds and rules.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Modify lead type weightings
	•	Save/publish rules to backend ☑
	•	TBD…

[CRM‑207] Smart lead routing rules

Description: Route high-score leads to assigned rep based on region.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Apply after score > threshold
	•	@dev Add region check logic
	•	TBD…

[CRM‑208] AI assist: next-best-action prompt

Description: Suggest next action based on contact history and score.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Trigger when lead is inactive 7+ days
	•	Recommend call/email nudge
	•	TBD…

[CRM‑209] Track reply rates for cadences

Description: Capture replies, calculate % per email step.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Detect reply-to on outgoing emails ☑
	•	Show per-step %
	•	TBD…

[CRM‑210] Admin controls for feature access

Description: Enable/disable enrichment and scoring tools per org.
Acceptance Criteria:
	•	Toggle via admin dashboard
	•	☐ Log changes for audit
	•	TBD…
Notes: @dev permission schema draft in progress
